The video was circulated on social media: including Twitter and Facebook, by multiple users.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, broke down the video into keyframes and performed a reverse image search, leading them to a report by Gujarati media outlet Divya Bhaskar published in 2018. The report stated that the video was shot in Rajouri, Jammu and Kashmir.
J: K police tweeted about the incident in 2018, providing information about the arrest of the main accused in the case.
